name: Alpha Proof Of Concept v0.77
body:
- new logger
- updated core to 0.19.0.1 and elements to 0.18.1.3
- updated bitcoin ndk toolkit to r20b
- updated tor to 0.4.2.5

name: Alpha Proof Of Concept v0.76
body:
- updated knots 0.18.1.knots20190920
- updated openssl used in tor to 1.1.1d
- updated tor 0.4.1.6
- re-enabled disabling of tor's dirauth module
- updated gradle and android support lib to latest

name: Alpha Proof Of Concept v0.75
body:
- updated knots 0.18.1.knots20190920
- updated openssl used in tor to 1.1.1d
- updated tor 0.4.1.6
- enabled tor hardening
- re-enabled disabling of tor's dirauth module
- updated gradle and android support lib to latest

name: Alpha Proof Of Concept v0.74
body:
- update bitcoin core to 0.18.1.x
- update to elements 0.17.0.1
- update to latest debian buster
- update openssl, libevent, tor
- UX improvements & bug fixing

name: Alpha Proof Of Concept v0.64
body:

- Updated bitcoin core to 0.16.1

name: Alpha Proof Of Concept v0.63
body:
- Updated Android libraries
- Updated bitcoin core and knots on 0.16.0

name: Alpha Proof Of Concept v0.62
body:
- switched to native builds via NDK for both core and knots both 0.15.1
        - less to download and to store locally (3MB vs 60-100MB)
        - less code
- improved blockchain sync progress using getblockchaininfo verificationprogress
- improved package download progress bar
- added support for external storage access post Android M
- added support for Oreo, including new notification mechanism
- added support for bitcoind RPC cookie
- updated android and gradle libraries
- changed minimum target to android 21 (required by NDK for native builds)

name: Alpha Proof Of Concept v0.61
body: - updated bitcoin core and knots to 0.15.1
